quest.name: Freedom for Our Skies
journal: Leofard wishes you to join him in his questioning of Radlia.
Leofard has asked you to accompany him in his interrogation of Radlia. Join the Redbill captain in his chambers, and wait for Radlia to regain consciousness.

Scarcely has Radlia had time to digest the fate of her crew when Leofard questions her motives for exploring the ruins of Mhach. The Talon captain reveals her discovery of an ancient book that details the existence of both the Void Ark and the Nullstone─the knowledge of which fueled her ultimately disastrous ambition. After rejecting Cait Sith's offer to join the Redbills in their quest to defeat the voidsent, Radlia leaves the tattered tome with Leofard. The Redbill captain immediately urges Cait Sith to learn more of the Mhachi relic in his possession, adamant that the freedom of the skies will be threatened no more...
objectives: Speak with Leofard in his chambers.

dialogue.name: STACIA
dialogue.text:
Aye, it all worked out in the end, but I've had just about enough of Leofard's folly.
...Ugh, I must've said that a hundred times by now.

dialogue.name: CAITSITH
dialogue.text: ...Did the captain receive a blow to the head while we were in Mhach? I could have sworn he just paid me a compliment.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: We might be waitin' a while before Radlia finally decides to wake up.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: But not so long that you've got time to flit away on some other adventure. Come join me in my quarters, and we can ask her a few questions as soon as she's ready to talk.

dialogue.name: STACIA
dialogue.text:
Radlia was moanin' the entire trip back to the Parrock. It can't have been a pleasant experience, bein' dragged around by that nasty fiend...
Anyway, let's go haunt the captain's quarters until she regains her senses.

dialogue.name: CAITSITH
dialogue.text: Once I have learned to harness the full power of the Nullstone, we shall have naught to fear from even the Shadow Queen herself!

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: Ho there, Forename. Might as well make yourself comfortable while we wait on Radlia. Besides, after fightin' through them ruins, I'll wager you could use the rest.

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: Where is the rest of my crew? Surely there were other survivors...?

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: Tell me, Radlia. What drove you to risk explorin' old Mhach? The compass sent you there, aye, but you were after the Void Ark. You knew somethin', didn't you?

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: I found a book. We were looting these strange ruins in the Sea of Clouds, and one of the lads dug up a tome. It had passages that described the Void Ark...and a powerful relic called the “Nullstone.”

dialogue.name: CAITSITH
dialogue.text: A tome scribed by a Mhachi sorcerer, mayhap? ...Captain, would you happen to know the author of this work?

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: The words are muddled by obscuring magicks, and fifteen hundred years have faded its pages. There is much that remains illegible, but what little my darling cutthroats and I could decipher suggests it was written by a mage of exceptional status.

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: See for yourself. If what the book says is true, the ark is a source of immeasurable power. With that ship under my command and the mysteries of Mhach in my possession, I had thought to crown myself queen of the skies...

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: ...And look how well that turned out. What manner of sky pirate─what manner of queen─can't even keep her own crew alive?

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: Ahem. Radlia, is it not? Would I be correct in assuming that you seek revenge against the voidsent who slaughtered your comrades?

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: Of course I want revenge! That hells-spawned shite-gobbler killed my crew! If he were here right now, I'd gouge out his eyes and choke him to death with my bare, bloody hands!

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: You are not alone in your desire to bring an end to these abominations, Captain. Will you not join us in our endeavor to secure peace for the skies? Will you not join the Talons' strength to ours?

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: ...What strength? The way things are right now, I doubt I could keep the peace in a monastery.

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: This has naught to do with personal grudges, either. I just don't have the men. All my best fighters died in the ruins, and the dregs that are left are scarce sharp enough to be called Talons.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: Did you leave your spine back in them ruins, Radlia? You've had your wings clipped, and no mistake, but that's no reason to give up the life. I thought we'd rescued a sky pirate─not some cur that turns tail when her pack ain't there to bite for her.

dialogue.name: RADLIA
dialogue.text: ...I know what you're trying to do, Redbill, but I've lost my taste for glory. You can have the cursed book. Just be sure to make that bastard pay.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: ...Hey, furball. How quickly do you think you can decipher that ratty old tome? I need you to figure out exactly how your relic works.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: Aye, you sent that one fiend squealin' in fear, but that ain't enough. From what you've told me, we'll need to aim for some of that “obliteration” if we're goin' to take on the Shadow Queen.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: The rest of you, put everythin' you've got into what you do best, be that research or bladework. Overdoin' it is doin' it just right, if you get my meanin'.

dialogue.name: LEOFARD
dialogue.text: I'll decorate my walls with voidsent heads if I have to. The skies should belong to no one...

dialogue.name: DIABOLOS
dialogue.text: ...The Nullstone hath fallen into mortal hands.

dialogue.name: FERDIAD
dialogue.text: A thousand apologies, Lord Diabolos! I shall personally wring each and every one of their scrawny necks!

dialogue.name: DIABOLOS
dialogue.text: The time for skulking in shadows hath ended. I am grown weary of these meddling vermin...

dialogue.name: DIABOLOS
dialogue.text: The power of the Shadow Queen waxeth full! Soon, mine ardent desire shall pass from dream into dark reality!
